product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Whether you're on a casual ride in the sun or keeping the pace high in the group, the Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool bike shorts offer cooling performance to keep you comfortable when the heat is on. In-R-Cool(R) fabric reflects the sun's rays to reduce fabric surface temperature, helping keep you cooler in sunny conditions. Fabric also transfers moisture to the outer surface for fast evaporation, plus it offers UPF 50 protection from the sun's rays. Side mesh vents provide ventilation in warmer conditions. Anatomic 6-panel design offers balanced support and comfort. 4-way stretch Elite 3D chamois is pre-shaped and has 13mm of variable density padding to cushion, reduce friction and wick moisture. Chamois features active carbon yarns to help reduce odors and regulate temperature. Silicone leg grippers on hems help hold shorts in place; shorts have 9 in. inseam (on size medium). Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool bike shorts have reflective highlights to improve your nighttime visibility.
